name: superdweebie/authentication-module
description: Zend Framework 2 Module that provides authentication functionality

suggest.doctrine/doctrine-module: The auth adapter in doctrine/doctrine-module is the default configured auth adapter
suggest.superdweebie/sijit: A dojo extensions that include a javascript client for this authentication module
suggest.superdweebie/user-module: The user model from superdweebie/user-module is the default configured user object
